title: Diet Plan
description:
Breakfast 09:30 AM

  • #60gms Oats/Museli with Milk and Honey

  • #32gms Peanut Butter
  • #20gms Almonds
  • #Fruit Bowl 

Dinner 08:30 PM

  • #100gms Chicken (boneless)
    • Veg Days – 100gms Paneer
  • Big Bowl Salad
